name: The Elevator Game
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE:
VR SUPPORT IS CURRENTLY LIMITED TO OCULUS QUEST 2 ONLY. THE GAME STILL CAN BE LAUNCHED AS A STANDARD PROGRAM ON COMPUTERS AND LAPTOPS, WITHOUT USING A VR DEVICE.

How to Play the Elevator Game:

1. Start the Game at midnight.
2. Turn off your mobile devices and put away anything that could break your concentration.
3. Make sure you're alone.
4. Invite the Passenger. Once you do that, the Game will start.
5. Don't get out at any of the floors.
6. Upon reaching any floor, check your surroundings. If anything seems off, even the smallest detail, immediately proceed to another floor.
7. Reach the Lobby to beat the Game.
